DOC.brief_summary: Patients ( N=102 ) meet diagnostic criterion alcohol , cocaine , marijuana , opiate abuse dependence meet research staff two day quit preparation session ( 2 per day ) . These session include test breath sample evidence smoking twice day ( separate least 5 hour ) , counsel base Public Health Service ( PHS ) guideline quit smoke second session day , set quit date . After session , participant randomly assign one two 4-week condition : ( ) standard care ( b ) standard care plus prize CM smoke abstinence opportunity win prize submit sample meet smoke abstinence criterion ( e.g. , CO ≤ 6ppm ; cotinine ≤ 30ng/mL ) . Nicotine withdrawal related measure assess throughout intervention . Follow-up data collect 6-months post-quit date .
DOC.criteria: current alcohol , cocaine , marijuana , opiate abuse dependence smoke ≥ 10 cigarette per day expire CO > 8 ppm selfreported interest quit smoking , ≥ 18 year old willing provide name , address phone number individual assist locate participant followup evaluation , English speaking currently receive behavioral therapy pharmacotherapy smoking plan use pharmacotherapy quit attempt serious , uncontrolled psychiatric illness ( e.g. , acute schizophrenia , suicide risk ) cognitive impairment recovery pathological gambling
